mdRecord.dcterms:description: At far right, first half of a question posed to the reader, asking if they have lost their virginity ("V-card"), with options to circle yes or no [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
(lost V-card?) | yes no | son of thunder | Elmo's world | I am strong
